initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards application, has opened the card view for a specific card, and is viewing the card's details.
steps: Locate the 'Add tasks' button within the card view.
Click the 'Add tasks' button to open a new task input field.
Enter the task details in the input field.
Confirm the addition of the new task.
expected_state: A new task is added to the card, listed under the tasks section within the card view.
